timeline.message:
prefer release_bom.sh

@suztomo There are still some improvements to be made, but I've now run the new process end-to-end multiple times. It is much quicker and easier than clicking through multiple Rapid screens.

timeline.bodyText:

Shorter is clear.
timeline.author: suztomo

replies.bodyText: Yes, but even better is not doing it at all, which is often the case. :-)
